Pre-Game Insights: New York Knicks are on a six-game win streak and are looking to build upon it with a victory over Washington.
The Wizards have a 1-22 record in games decided by 10 or more points.
The Knicks are ninth in the Eastern Conference with 33.0 defensive rebounds per game led by Karl-Anthony Towns averaging 10.7.
The Wizards average 12.1 made 3-pointers per game this season, 1.5 fewer makes per game than the Knicks allow (13.6).
The Knicks average 14.1 made 3-pointers per game this season, 0.3 fewer makes per game than the Wizards allow.
Jordan Poole is averaging 21.3 points, five assists and 1.6 steals for the Wizards.
Karl-Anthony Towns is averaging 24.3 points, 13.5 rebounds and 3.4 assists for the Knicks.
